entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 5:54 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain this evening. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
